results.content: Having Java developer background this is a little below my experience (my fault) Very good course to learn basics of Ruby on Rails. Instructor is very knowledgable and explains in great detail!
results.content_html: Having Java developer background this is a little below my experience (my fault) Very good course to learn basics of Ruby on Rails. Instructor is very knowledgable and explains in great detail!

results.content:
Did not cover Begin/Rescue error handling very well.  Also, course was originally done several years ago. Although Mr. Elder tried to update it somewhat, it did not cover the most recent Ruby and Rails software.  Disappointing, so took off one star.
It was nice to have an instructor who speaks clearly, and his enthusiasm is infectious. Plus you learn a LOT even if it is somewhat outdated.
results.content_html:

results.content: The instruction is very clear so far. No issue at all.
results.content_html: The instruction is very clear so far. No issue at all.

results.content: The instructor is very good, but the program is outdated and none of the gems used in the videos work anymore. You can verify by looking at students questions in the Q&A that go unanswered/unresolved. Asking for assistance won’t help (see Q&A) so you’ll be on your own to fix the issues.
results.content_html: The instructor is very good, but the program is outdated and none of the gems used in the videos work anymore. You can verify by looking at students questions in the Q&A that go unanswered/unresolved. Asking for assistance won’t help (see Q&A) so you’ll be on your own to fix the issues.

results.content: Great course, really took me from zero to hero in ruby. Had some web apps (ideas) that i was planning to do in laravel after learning laravel but caught up with rails faster in just a couple of hours. Thanks John!
results.content_html: Great course, really took me from zero to hero in ruby. Had some web apps (ideas) that i was planning to do in laravel after learning laravel but caught up with rails faster in just a couple of hours. Thanks John!

results.content: This is a great course.  John presents well organized material and builds a real-world application using very good tools.  The experience was so good that I'm going to to take more of his courses at codemy.com.
results.content_html: This is a great course. John presents well organized material and builds a real-world application using very good tools. The experience was so good that I'm going to to take more of his courses at codemy.com.

results.content: Bringing my programming into the 21st century. Interesting to see how much simpler programming is these days.
results.content_html: Bringing my programming into the 21st century. Interesting to see how much simpler programming is these days.

results.content:
Hallo,
The course started really slowly, a bit boring for a person with development background.
The pace has picked up and I am learning a lot. 
John is explaining really well, giving hints and extra bit of information, where to find what on gems, bootstrap, etc, so one can do this on your own in future.
The course actually includes a few smaller courses and is really comprehensive.
Thx John!
